mapper.insert: insert into db_bank_record (bank_code, flow_money, type, source) values (#{bankCode}, #{flowMoney}, #{type}, #{source});
mapper.select: select id, bank_code as bankCode, flow_money as flowMoney, type as type, source as source from db_bank_record order by id DESC limit #{page} , #{limit};
select id, bank_code as bankCode, flow_money as flowMoney, type as type, source as source from db_bank_record where id = #{loanId}
